contacts.name: Misha
contacts.signature: Keep it up! The new world is just ahead!

201280000.text: Are you there...? Excuse me, I wanted to ask if there are any recommendations for things I'll need for traveling?

201280001.text: The Express has everything you need. You don't need to bring anything

201280002.text: They even prepare a change of clothes? The Express really is the best!

201280003.text: Although, hearing you say that makes me worry even more... Ah, what else do I need to take with me?

201280004.text: Phone, credits, a baseball bat! They're all pretty practical, right?

201280005.text: Yeah! Communications, currency, and an item for self-defense... are all absolute necessities!

201280006.text: But these things aside, what else will I need...

201280007.text: I finally got a short amount of vacation time, but I haven't even decided where I want to travel to!

201280008.text: I want to prepare my luggage, then select my destination. Then, I can just set off right away!

201280009.text: Would you like to come with us? We'll leave tomorrow!

201280010.text: That's very tempting, but I only have three days... I don't think that's very suitable for long-distance travel

201280011.text: You could actually spend your holiday in the hotel

201280012.text: That's a really good idea... I may have worked here for a long time, but I've never enjoyed the hotel's services as a guest before!

201280013.text: I just know there are lots of exciting things to explore. Just thinking about it makes me so happy!!!

201280014.text: Are you not scared traveling alone? What if you run into bad people?

201280015.text: I'm not scared! I decided I am going to learn from you, {NICKNAME}! I'm going to buy a baseball bat to protect myself!

201280017.text: No matter where you are, pictures can always bring us closer together

201280019.text: ...A solitary and frozen land... do these Snow Plains have a name? What planet are they on? Can you visit without an invitation?

201280020.text: These Snow Plains are on the planet Jarilo-VI, outside the town of Belobog. You are free to go whenever you like

201280021.text: Great. I have to go and see this place!

201280022.text: Speaking with you makes me so happy! It feels like I've already started on my dream adventure. You have to tell me more next time!
